_header: All this world may know full well
_description: A carol of the Annunciation — seven quatrains and the two-line burden ‘Nowell Nowell Nowell Nowell by the grettyng of gabriell / Nowell Nowell Nowell Nowell þat borne is owr emanuell’

TakamiyaBible.First Lines:
All this world may knowe full wellComyn is owre lyffe owre hope
                    oure heyll…
TakamiyaBible.Last Lines:
…[torn] and had a hayll[torn]th ys
                    all
TakamiyaBible.Note:
Verso of the final flyleaf, water-stained, in a late fifteenth-century
                    hand.
TakamiyaBible.Editions:
Edwards,  A. S. G.,  and  Toshiyuki Takamiya.  
             “Note: A New Middle English Carol.” 
             Medium Aevum.
         70 (2001):112-115: 112-13.
